channel.title: Webclient jarring [loveandpower mind helping me :D]
channel.description:
I jarred my client have the ip changed cachedownloader works and everything when i put the jarred file in the client files it works fine but when i change it and put the file in dropbox to get public link and paste in my applet i get a white screen saying "error checking for details" at the top left corner
Can anyone tell me how i can fix this

ill post my code in just a while to see if i got same problem

item.title: Webclient jarring [loveandpower mind helping me :D]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“fozzard, post:3, topic:428832”]hey ive got the same problem

java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\Cache\Cache.rar (The system cannot find the path specified)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.(Unknown Source)
at CacheDownloader.downloadFile(CacheDownloader.java:81)
at CacheDownloader.downloadCache(CacheDownloader.java:56)
at client.startUp(client.java:7309)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:4755)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\Cache\Cache.rar (The system cannot find the path specified)
at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at CacheDownloader.unZip(CacheDownloader.java:123)
at CacheDownloader.downloadCache(CacheDownloader.java:57)
at client.startUp(client.java:7309)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:4755)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

i know it says that but my cache is there so im rather unsure what ive done wrong[/quote]you zipped your cache folder instead of the contents
